document.full_text: david wright has struggled to hit home runs at citi field the last two years, but he hit two more against the diamondbacks, giving him four for the year and helping the mets cruise to a win.
document.title: mets 8, diamondbacks 4: homering at home, wright powers the mets
lines_and_colors: david wright has struggled to hit home runs at citi field the last two years, but he hit two more against the diamondbacks, giving him four for the year and helping the mets cruise to a win.
